Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-26147 affecting package helm for versions less than 3.13.2-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-26147 affecting package helm for versions less than 3.13.2-3. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package helm is earlier than 3.13.2-3, affected by CVE-2024-26147
